title: The Truth About Love Tour
description:
Returning to the Manchester venue for the first time in four years, the US singer-songwriter will be performing tracks from her latest album, The Truth About Love, alongside the hits Get The Party Started, Just Like A Pill, Trouble and Family Portrait.
Known around the world as one of the most captivating live performers of her generation, P!nk's Funhouse and Summer Carnival tours in 2009 and 2010 saw the global superstar perform to over 2.9 million people over 194 dates.

April's show marks the chart-topping singer's eighth performance at the Manchester Arena since her debut in March 2004, making her second only to Kylie Minogue for most number of performances by a female solo artist in the history of the venue.

http://www.pinktickets.org.uk/
